thread.title: Accor Hotels appoints exec with dual role in China
thread.title_full: Accor Hotels appoints exec with dual role in China

author: eTN Editor
title: Accor Hotels appoints exec with dual role in China
text:
Accor Hotels appoints exec with dual role in China Adv: Goran Aleks Adv: 
Accor Hotels has appointed an executive to fill a dual role of Vice President Operations of South China andGeneral Manager of Sofitel Macau At Ponte 16.
